programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: My Dosen is My Husband

programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Annam
programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: Thomas Pesquet : Objectif France
programme.desc: From space, with astronaut Thomas Pesquet, but also thanks to satellite images of Earth, we embark on an odyssey through the very heart of France and its natural landscapes. An opportunity for a different view of the country and its overseas territories, so small when seen on a global scale.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 18

programme.desc: In Namur, we discover the great renovation of a worker's house. This ancient blacksmith's workshop has been completely transformed into a house filled with light. We also visit the renovated ruins of the Chateau d'Aische en Refail before checking out the programme's tiny house.

programme.desc: From the Ariege to the Aude, from Pyrenean foothills to Mediterranean shores, the legendary Cathar Trail, the GR367, stretches for 250 kilometres. An opportunity for hikers to discover impregnable citadels, the ruins of Queribus, Cathar remains, the Galamus Gorges and the salt marshes of Gruissan.

programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphael, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Grand Marin
programme.desc: Lili dreams of going fishing in the far North. After persuading Ian, a trawler captain, to give her a chance, she boards the ''Rebel''. The only woman in the crew, the ''sparrow'' is going to stay determined to complete her quest.

programme.title: Ya Benti
programme.desc: Sabrina, lesbian, is about to marry Younes, her childhood friend, who is also gay. A marriage that suits both of them because it reassures and delights their families. But on the eve of the ceremony, Sabrina begins to have doubts.

programme.title: 47 Pouces
programme.desc: One night, seven-year-old Zelie sees her Aunt Clara arrive at the family home. The young woman is sad, has bandages on her wrists and does not leave her room.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 5
programme.desc: Henri's parental responsibilities catch up with him when, in the middle of the night, he receives a worrying call from Alice, Marine is missing. Upset by a press report claiming that the murder investigation is going round in circles, Simone and Danno step up their efforts and refine their strategy.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 6
programme.desc: Simone and Danno interview a member of the consultative committee, someone Anne had worked with as part of her awareness campaign. For the first time, Anne is described as being a woman with problems. The revelation upsets Henri. Perhaps his marriage wasn't as perfect as he thought?

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 10
programme.desc: Africa Fashion Up, exploring the world of African fashion. A wardrobe-essential everyone wears, the very French story of jeans. In addition to creating the Palme d'Or, the haute joaillerie house Chopard has launched a special jewellery collection for the Cannes Film Festival. Popular and urban: wearing a bomber jacket.

programme.title: L'amour D'une Femme
programme.desc: Marie Prieur, a young doctor, takes up a post on Ouessant Island. Quickly adopted by the inhabitants, she becomes friends with the school teacher. When she falls in love with a young engineer, Andre Lorenzi, he quickly makes it clear that she must choose between marriage and her profession.

programme.title: Nous Les Griots
programme.desc: Malik, Daouda's eldest son, wants to marry Mariama. But when a meeting between the two families, both originally from Senegal, is organised over a meal, Daouda discovers that they are from two very different social classes. His family is ''griot''; Mariama's is noble.

programme.desc: In this episode, we follow Viola Tami as she explores unusual homes, vibrant with colour and their own touch of magic. Whether they the friends or family of artists or architects of their own living space, we meet people with passion, in search of a unique lifestyle.

programme.title: Tour De Cote D'ivoire 2025
programme.desc: Summary of the day's Tour de la Cote d'Ivoire with highlights, classifications and the chance to find out more about a location from the day's stage.

programme.title: 6h Info

programme.title: L'epicerie - EP 10
programme.desc: The show's team tests a dozen puff pastries to identify the crispiest and airiest ones, revealing significant disparities. Also: should sulfites in food be demonized; celebrating 50 years of Montreal's community gardens; the aromas of dahl.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 6

programme.title: Partie De Campagne - EP 2
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphael, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 6

programme.title: Asia 2050
programme.desc: By 2050, the future of Bangladesh’s coastal communities faces a defining challenge. programme.title: Movie - Paayum Puli (New)
programme.desc: When an extortion gang spreads terror in Madurai, ACP Jayasheelan is assigned to bring an end to their wrongdoing. However, he is unaware that the mastermind of the crimes is someone close to him.

programme.title: Movie - Vedham
programme.desc: After a man saves someone, they become best friends and he is invited to stay at his house. When he learns that the man he saved has filed for a divorce, he takes it upon himself to unite the couple.

programme.title: Movie - Pathinettu Vayasu Puyaley
programme.desc: This story is about 18-year-olds who let their imagination run riot. The scenes that happened in Preethi Varma's real life are reflected in this film.

programme.title: Movie - Pathirama Pathukonga
programme.desc: Sabari, a young man, falls in love with Indra, a college girl, and proposes to her. However she rejects his proposal as she is engaged, so Sabari befriends her fiance to break up their relationship.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Dost
programme.desc: Vishwa's best friend Raghu betrays him for money and gets him arrested for a crime he did not commit. Soon after his release, Vishwa seeks revenge and decides to commit the crime he was jailed for.

programme.title: Movie - Pulivesham
programme.desc: Munian has to care for the daughter of the man who helped him when he was young. He lands in Chennai and the girl follows him. Circumstances turn him into a gangster while the girl ends up in a coma.

programme.title: Movie - Enaintha Kaikal
programme.desc: At the request of a desperate mother, an ex-army man sets out to rescue her son who is being held in a military prison. Another man is on a mission to kidnap that prisoner and kill the ex-army man.

programme.title: Movie - Salangai Oli
programme.desc: Balakrishna, a trained Kuchipudi dancer, gets an opportunity to compete in a classical dance festival. However, two days prior to his performance, his mother passes away, leaving him devastated.

programme.title: Movie - Kizhakku Cheemayile
programme.desc: A brother shares a close bond with his sister and is ecstatic to see her get married. However, problems arise when his new brother-in-law disapproves of the siblings' relationship.

programme.title: Movie - Manaivikku Mariyathai
programme.desc: Priya decides to work after her husband loses his job, despite his initial reluctance. Trouble ensues when Priya's employer falls in love with her and forces her to marry him.

programme.title: Movie - Pattam Parakkattum
programme.desc: Thyagu, a poor graduate, tries to get work to treat his father's visual disability. He falls in love with his neighbour, but her parents are not keen on her marriage since her salary is dearer to them.

programme.title: Movie - Pavalakodi
programme.desc: In school, Shiva never disclosed his love for Paval. Seven year later, he hires Robert to find her. Robert falls in love with Paval and lies to Shiva that she is now a fat, unmarried mother of three.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Poomagal Oorvalam
programme.desc: Sarvanan, adopted by a childless couple, falls in love with Kavitha, the daughter of a caste-obsessed Sengodan. He tries to change Sengodan's attitude in order to marry Kavitha.

programme.title: Movie - Uchithanai Muharnthaal
programme.desc: Punithavadhi, a 13-year-old girl, is raped and impregnated by Sri Lankan military soldiers. The girl's mother tries to save her with the help of a professor.

programme.title: Movie - Oomai Vizhigal
programme.desc: PRK is on a killing spree whereby he randomly kills women and is aided by a local politician and nefarious doctor. A policeman and a committed journalist join hands to nab him.

programme.title: Movie - Billa (Old)
programme.desc: Billa, a powerful outlaw with a long list of enemies, kills Rajesh, a member of his gang, after he quits the criminal life. But Rajesh's fiancee and his sister pledge to take revenge on Billa.

programme.title: Movie - Anjaan
programme.desc: Krishna, who comes to Mumbai in search of his missing brother, learns that he was a dreaded gangster known as Raju Bhai. Later, an interesting twist unfolds when Krishna meets his brother's enemies.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Prague Open is a professional women's tennis tournament that is held in Prague, Czech Republic. It began in 2010 initially as an ITF Circuit event before becoming an WTA International tournament in 2015. The tournament is played on outdoor hardcourts, at the TK Sparta Prague.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship2025 Day 1: R1-10 (Xiao Guodong vs Matthew Selt)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group B: Czechia vs Brazil
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: World Pool C'ship2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Pool Championship will be held in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. The event will take place at the Green Halls. This year features a record-breaking prize fund, with a staggering $250,000 awaiting the champion, from a record-breaking $1,000,000 prize fund.

programme.title: ASO Miscellaneous Programming 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Spartan Ultra World Championship is the ultimate endurance battle that requires participants to be relentless as they trek through dense forests, ascend towering peaks, and descend steep slopes while putting their endurance, strength, and unwavering spirit to the test.

programme.title: TotalEnergies BWF World Championships 2025
programme.desc: The BWF World Championships is the most prestigious badminton competition, offering the most ranking points. The winners of the tournament are World Champions of the sport and are awarded a gold medal. The tournament started in 1977. Starting 2006, the tournament was changed to an annual event on the BWF calendar. The tournament is not held during the Summer Olympics years to avoid schedule conflicts.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 14
programme.desc: We join Thiago Silva in his native Brazil to reflect on his remarkable footballing journey; from overcoming life-threatening illness early in his career to becoming one of the world's most respected defenders. We explore his late-career success in the Premier League, his influence on and off the pitch and life at current club Fluminese.

programme.title: MATCH OFFICIALS MIC'D UP - TUES 02 SEP
programme.desc: Join PGMOL Chief Refereeing Officer Howard Webb and former Premier League star Michael Owen, as they use previously un-released audio from the on-field officials and VAR teams to explain refereeing decisions. This ground-breaking broadcast will feature the in-game audio of selected incidents from the 2025/26 season.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 1
programme.desc: Former Premier League stars select their dream teams from the best they played with or against, guiding us through their picks with stories from on and off the pitch.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 3
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 3
programme.desc: Born in Lodi, raised in Brescia and Milan, home now on Tyneside, Sandro Tonali has established himself as an influential part of Eddie Howe's Newcastle side since his statement transfer from boyhood club AC Milan in 2023. In this week's Big Interview, the Toon's number eight reflects on his triumphs and tribulations, including helping the Rossoneri to a first Scudetto in 11 years and adapting to life on and off the pitch in the North-East of England.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 13
programme.desc: We catch up with Christian Benteke in Washington, where the powerful Belgian striker now leads the line for D.C. United. From his early days in Belgium to his explosive arrival in the Premier League with Aston Villa, followed by big moves to Liverpool and Crystal Palace, Benteke's journey has been one of raw talent, resilience, and reinvention.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (GB: SALAH)
programme.desc: From free-kicks to solo runs, scissor kicks to 30-yard screamers, Goals of the Season revisits some of the most memorable strikes from the 24/25 campaign, whilst paying homage to the Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 14
programme.desc: We join Thiago Silva in his native Brazil to reflect on his remarkable footballing journey; from overcoming life-threatening illness early in his career to becoming one of the world's most respected defenders. We explore his late-career success in the Premier League, his influence on and off the pitch and life at current club Fluminese.

programme.title: PL 100: THIERRY HENRY
programme.desc: Premier League 100, celebrates some of the leading names to have achieved iconic milestones within England's top flight. From scoring over 100 goals, to making over 100 clean sheets, we speak to the legends that left their mark and reflect on the goals and saves that set them apart from their rivals

programme.title: PL BEST OF... PREMIER LEAGUE FRENCH CONNECTION
programme.desc: A celebration of France's greatest football icons, featuring Thierry Henry, David Ginola, Robert Pires, Claude Makelele, Emmanuel Petit and many more.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 6
programme.desc: We sit down with Claude Makelele to reflect on the career of a true midfield master. Celebrated for redefining the defensive midfield role, Makelele shares his memories of life in the Premier League, from joining Chelsea during a transformative era to becoming the heartbeat of a title-winning side. With insight from teammates, coaches, and opponents, we explore the intelligence, discipline, and influence that made his name synonymous with the position he perfected.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 4
programme.desc: After just one year of top flight football, Micky van de Ven signed for Tottenham Hotspur - quickly establishing himself as a key figure in Spurs' Europa League winning side, his iconic clearance playing a crucial part in securing the club a first major trophy for 17 years. In this week's Big Interview, we discuss his rise from the Dutch second division, to the Bundesliga with Wolfsburg before making the move to the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 4
programme.desc: We sit down with ex-Premier League referee Howard Webb, to talk about his early days as a South Yorkshire policeman to becoming one of the most respected referees in world football. In this candid interview Webb shares stories of his rise through the Premier League ranks, culminating in the honour of refereeing the 2010 FIFA World Cup Final. Along the way, he shares the challenges, pressures, and defining moments of a career spent making the game's toughest calls on the biggest stages.

programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 47
programme.desc: We look back on the extraordinary career of Mohamed Salah, tracing his rise from a small village in Egypt to global football stardom. We speak to those closest to him to highlight his early years, struggles, and determination, shedding light on the pivotal moments that shaped his journey to becoming a Premier League legend with Liverpool.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 4
programme.desc: After just one year of top flight football, Micky van de Ven signed for Tottenham Hotspur - quickly establishing himself as a key figure in Spurs' Europa League winning side, his iconic clearance playing a crucial part in securing the club a first major trophy for 17 years. In this week's Big Interview, we discuss his rise from the Dutch second division, to the Bundesliga with Wolfsburg before making the move to the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 14
programme.desc: We join Thiago Silva in his native Brazil to reflect on his remarkable footballing journey; from overcoming life-threatening illness early in his career to becoming one of the world's most respected defenders. We explore his late-career success in the Premier League, his influence on and off the pitch and life at current club Fluminese.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (GB: SALAH)
programme.desc: From free-kicks to solo runs, scissor kicks to 30-yard screamers, Goals of the Season revisits some of the most memorable strikes from the 24/25 campaign, whilst paying homage to the Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 12
programme.desc: We follow the remarkable journey of Olivier Giroud, from his Premier League days with Arsenal and Chelsea to Champions League glory and beyond. A World Cup winner known for his elegance and resilience, Giroud's career has taken him from London to Milan, then to LA, and now back home with a move to Lille. As he begins this new chapter, we reflect on the highs, the hurdles, and the legacy of one of football's most underrated and enduring strikers.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 5
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Morgan Rogers, Joelinton, Martin Odegaard and Ryan Gravenberch.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 4

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 13
programme.desc: One of the most elegant players ever to grace the beautiful game, Dimitar Berbatov reached his peak in the red of Manchester United. The Bulgarian recalls his journey, from humble beginnings to becoming a Premier League champion and Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 7
programme.desc: We sit down with Bruno Guimarães to trace his remarkable journey from the streets of Brazil to Premier League stardom with Newcastle United. Travelling back to South America, we meet the family, friends, and coaches who shaped his early years and believed in his dream. Bruno opens up about the sacrifices, setbacks, and defining moments that fuelled his rise, offering a heartfelt look at the person behind the player.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 3
programme.desc: Born in Lodi, raised in Brescia and Milan, home now on Tyneside, Sandro Tonali has established himself as an influential part of Eddie Howe's Newcastle side since his statement transfer from boyhood club AC Milan in 2023. In this week's Big Interview, the Toon's number eight reflects on his triumphs and tribulations, including helping the Rossoneri to a first Scudetto in 11 years and adapting to life on and off the pitch in the North-East of England.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Andrew Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha
programme.desc: This episode features main event Andrew 'One Gear' Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha for the heavyweight title. From EFC71 in Carnival City, Johannesburg, South Africa on 23-June-2018.

programme.title: WCCB Canelo Alvarez vs. Jermell Charlo
programme.desc: One of the most anticipated fights in boxing takes place at the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas as two Undisputed World Champions meet -unified Super Middleweight titleholder, Canelo Alvarez, defending against Junior Middleweight champ Jermell Charlo. Canelo has established himself as one of boxing's best fighters, winning World Titles in four different weight classes on his way to becoming boxing's biggest star.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Arturo Gatti vs. Alfonso Gomez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Arturo Gatti facing off with Alfonso Gomez in what would be Gatti's final boxing match. Also on the card, Andre Berto takes on veteran Carlos Quintana on his way to stardom.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3 from Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we follow one of our martial artists as he goes through a grueling tournament and how he uses technology to help him prepare for it.

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO & IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. Freddy Hernandez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode sees Andre Berto defend the WBC welterweight championship against Freddy Hernandez. With one quick, hard right hand to the face in the first round, this bout comes to a sudden halt. Berto looks to keep his undefeated streak alive and thrust himself into talks for bigger fights with the likes of stars such as Floyd Mayweather. Also on the card, Jean Pascal looks for an upset in the light heavyweight division.

programme.desc: WBC & WBO Women's Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund puts her titles and undefeated record on the line in front of her hometown fans at the Royal Arena in Copenhagen, Denmark, taking on top contender Mary Romero of Spain. programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items - but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. programme.desc: Discover a forgotten POW-turned-refugee camp, Chiang Kai-shek's secret military command centre and an extensive underground city.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII - EP 5
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Darrell Miklos and his team make a discovery far older than they expected. Later, new evidence emerges suggesting that the team may have uncovered a long-lost battle at Target 4.

programme.title: Swamp People: Serpent Invasion (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Troy and Pickle hunt a giant python known as the Night Serpent. Tess convinces Bill to try out new hunting grounds, but Bill is not sure it's a good idea.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14) - EP 5
programme.desc: Anna takes aim at swamp monsters with her bow and arrow. Pickle surprises Troy with her secret weapon. Little Willie breaks news to his dad that transforms their season.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12) - EP 2
programme.desc: Tom instructs young Hank on some essential Mountain Man skills. Newlyweds Jake and Anika hunt elk in the bone-chilling cold while Paul takes on an infestation of nuisance badgers.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3) - EP 14
programme.desc: There are some events that are so destructive, so astounding, or truly miraculous, that for the faithful, they must be directed by the hand of the Almighty. The Great Flood. The Plagues of Egypt.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: Throughout history humans have buried their dead; in caves or chambers, in pyramids or in some form of a tomb - but why? Ancient tombs were visual memorials for the dead.

programme.title: Ride n' Seek: Borneo (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Jaime expects an idyllic stay when she arrives in the world's largest water village. Instead, she ends up wielding a collection of bladed weapons.

programme.title: Ride n' Seek: Borneo (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Jaime heads deep into Sabah's interior, riding through rainforest and over rough terrain, hoping to explore a mysterious crater that has lain undisturbed since the dawn of time.

programme.desc: With new weather patterns looming, the days are numbered for those counting on foraging to pull them through. One survivalist is left confused as the Arctic takes back its gift.

programme.desc: From a Tarzan assault course towering 10m above ground to a 160km forced march, recruits of Malaysian Army Special Forces unit, Grup Gerak Khas, are pushed to their limits to earn the coveted Green Beret.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII - EP 4
programme.desc: With weather preventing Darrell Miklos and the team from diving from the boat, they attempt a risky strategy. Garth makes a solo journey to explore a deserted island where he discovers a mysterious cross.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: The team enlists special equipment in an epic search for two large air force planes that vanished without a trace with dozens of people on board. Despite a massive search, nothing was ever found.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: High school friends see an alternative to fast food with the "submarine" sandwich. But they are met with the fierce competition of a new submarine joint that is trying to perfect the art of the franchise.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S2) - EP 5
programme.desc: A forensic DNA expert, Dr Maria Corazon de Ungria helps prove a man's innocence and solves a victim's identity using bones.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: Malaysia's top forensic entomologist Dr Nazni Wasi Ahmad shows how insects on a corpse can provide useful clues on the death.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15) - EP 112
programme.desc: Tulsa detectives investigate how a young rapper was found shot dead on the street of an affluent suburban neighbourhood. The defence accuses the prosecution's key eyewitness of pulling the trigger.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st - EP 9
programme.desc: A brutal attack on two employees of a high-end shop leaves one woman dead and another scarred by the memory of the events she survived.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape - EP 4

programme.title: ABC Late News (2025) - EP 176
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business (2025) - EP 127
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: Movin' To The Country S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: On SA's Limestone Coast, Craig heads to a non-conformist winery, Kristy meets a couple who traded in a life of luxury yachts to hang out with camels and Halina explores a clever approach to tackling plastic waste.

programme.title: Dream Gardens S3 - EP 7
programme.desc: Two years ago, a couple had their son and daughter-in-law transform their bland backyard into a striking, sculptural retreat. Michael McCoy returns to see if the unique garden was worth the gamble.

programme.title: Four Corners (2025) - EP 12
programme.desc: In an extraordinary Four Corners exclusive, a former ASIO agent reveals to investigative reporter Sean Rubinsztein-Dunlop how a resurgent Islamic State network is radicalising Australian teens and plotting violence.

programme.title: Media Watch (2025) - EP 30
programme.desc: Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment. Host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent, brings you a fearless critique of the week's journalism.

programme.title: Landline (2025) - EP 28
programme.desc: The rise of cotton in the Kimberley; A popular high school program boosting agricultural futures; and guaranteed uncontaminated oats for gluten intolerance.

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 139
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 177
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 177

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe
programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street

programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.desc: We explore the world of biocomputing-where scientists are laying the foundation for a field that may blur the lines between the biological and synthetic.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Geothermal has been the underdog of the energy industry - but that may be about to change as new startups use fracking technologies to expand potential geothermal sites.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Scientists and entrepreneurs are testing radical ideas like solar radiation management and ocean fertilisation - and finding funding for it.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Flying cars have largely remained science fiction, until now. A new generation of electrified aircraft is attracting the attention of investors and venture capitalists around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer
programme.desc: Governments and entrepreneurs are racing to commercialize the moon. These efforts could unlock a new, deep-space economy. But to return and stay will require the highest levels of innovation.

programme.title: The Circuit with Emily Chang S3 - EP 8

programme.desc: Emily Chang speaks with Microsoft titans Bill Gates, Steve Ballmer and Satya Nadella about the company's journey from scrappy startup to global powerhouse.

programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Melinda French Gates in Seattle to discuss how she's navigating her next stage as a philanthropist and investor.

programme.title: The Circuit with Emily Chang S3 - EP 7

programme.title: Roblox's Predator Problem

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: The hosts sit with David Blitzer, co-founder of Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment, to discuss how his teams use data and analytics to improve the fan experience.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly sit down with Mellody Hobson, co-CEO and president of Ariel Investments, to discuss her firm's newly launched fund, "Project Level," devoted to investing in women's sports.

programme.desc: The Commanders DC Deal with Josh Harris. 26North founder and Washington Commanders owner Josh Harris talks about the team's recent stadium deal in DC and his mindset on team ownership.

programme.desc: Invite stylish men from all over the world to share cultural differences, feelings and values, and life experiences with Taiwanese!

programme.title: Hello Doctor - EP 1501
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: The Queen Show - EP 29
programme.desc: Sharp Queen Li Jing and Absurd Master Shen Yulin

programme.title: Dee Girl's Talk - EP 334
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: No.57 Dream Boulevard - EP 1782
programme.desc: More professional, richer, and more diversified car model information is shared with the audience.

programme.title: ShinyFoodDiary - EP 19
programme.desc: The host visits various places in a walking and themed way, focusing on what is most fashionable among young people nowadays.Check in on FB and IG to create new highlights and online clicks, not only delicious food, but also in-depth introduction.Introduce the cultural customs and festivals of various places.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1104
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Deep in the Realm of Conscience - EP 7
programme.desc: Set during the Tang dynasty, drama follows Prince of Ping, Princess Taiping, and their confidants as they vie for control of the imperial court, exposing layers of jealousy, betrayal and ambition amid the backdrop of court intrigue.

programme.title: Heroes In White & What's On Today - EP 3
programme.desc: A chivalrous doctor, having faced death, is devoted to carrying on his father's humanitarian spirit of helping the world. Educated in the West yet passionate about Chinese traditions, he provides free treatment to one patient after another abandoned by Western medicine.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2634
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Gourmet Express - Hong Kong & Taiwan Express*(HKTAI/Friday)
programme.desc: Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers in Hong Kong and Taiwan, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: Legend of Two Sisters in the Chaos - EP 15
programme.desc: During the Later Zhou dynasty, the Fu family becomes the focus of attention when a prophecy states that one of their daughters will become empress. This leads to people assuming that by destroying the Fu sisters, they will also destroy the throne.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies

programme.title: Romeo and His Butterfly Lover - EP 25
programme.desc: The story retells the classic tragic love stories between the butterfly lovers as well as Romeo and Juliet in a new-age modern take.

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Serendipity - EP 15
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Happily Ever After? - EP 5
programme.desc: This drama tells various entanglements of romantic relationships - violence and tenderness; ugliness and beauty; sadism and healing; reality and romance. Through four parts, the drama explores situations and questions that many have experienced.

programme.title: Golden City - EP 703
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2030
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 28
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship until they parted ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: Coroner's Diary - EP 3
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Qin Wan (Landy Li), the daughter of the minister of Dali Temple, relied on her superb medical and forensic skills to join hands with Prince Yan Chi (Ao Rui Peng) to solve unsolved cases and find the real culprit in order to vindicate her father.

programme.title: Road To Eternity - EP 8
programme.desc: The Envoy of Wisdom sympathised with mankind in their affliction, he swore to save all living beings before becoming a Buddha. He had transmigration of his soul into human being and named as HUI TAK (Lam Ka Tung)._x000D__x000D_TAK was very clever but aloof from fame and wealth. He admired a famous doctor’s granddaughter FUNG (Chan Miu Ying) and they were intimate to each other. On the other hand, PRINCESS MAN SHUI (Tong Ying Ying) liked TAK very much because of his intelligence.

programme.title: Angels of Mission - EP 17
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 18
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A - EP 3
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 19
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Road To Eternity - EP 9
programme.desc: The Envoy of Wisdom sympathised with mankind in their affliction, he swore to save all living beings before becoming a Buddha. He had transmigration of his soul into human being and named as HUI TAK (Lam Ka Tung)._x000D__x000D_TAK was very clever but aloof from fame and wealth. He admired a famous doctor’s granddaughter FUNG (Chan Miu Ying) and they were intimate to each other. On the other hand, PRINCESS MAN SHUI (Tong Ying Ying) liked TAK very much because of his intelligence.

programme.title: Angels of Mission - EP 18
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 19
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A - EP 4
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Heart Of Greed - EP 24
programme.desc: An abalone that has been passed on for generations_x000D_A legacy of hundred million dollars that everybody wants a share_x000D__x000D__x000D_It is a story of a renowned sea-products retailer and a big traditional family, in which there are those who manage to endure to the end, those who consider themselves superior to everyone else, those who love and respect their brothers, those who seek every opportunity to fulfill their ambition, those who stay loyal to their beloved,

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The "passion choir pilot program" trains students from three underperforming schools' choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the "passion choir" and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: The Truth: Final Episode
programme.desc: Raymond's lawyer licence is suspended as he has prevented the course of justice to clear his mother's conviction. He is subsequently framed for murder with every piece of evidence pointing towards him. The only one with proof of his innocence is his dying mother, who fights to stay alive long enough to exonerate her son before it is too late.

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Lady is the Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chen's past insult.

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: Yang Guo and Xiao Long Nu are deeply in love and live harmoniously in the ancient tomb. Xiao Long Nu proposes marriage one day but Yang Guo declines. Heartbroken, she leaves without a word. Devastated by her absence, Yang Guo searches tirelessly for her. When they finally reunite, he begs her to marry him-only for her to refuse his proposal.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlong's younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles...

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: The Sword Stained with Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yong's novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his father's martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hung's passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lu's disciple.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing's wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards' heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper's daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Flag of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponent's son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chan's elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them...

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Journey of the Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Loh's looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Come Drink with Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow" is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar "Drunken Cat" who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kong's entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother's Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Focus World News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest international and Taiwan news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker Championship 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2635
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. programme.title: Heroes In White - EP 4
programme.desc: A chivalrous doctor, having faced death, is devoted to carrying on his father's humanitarian spirit of helping the world. Educated in the West yet passionate about Chinese traditions, he provides free treatment to one patient after another abandoned by Western medicine.
